import { Component,ElementRef, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent implements OnInit { @ViewChild('f') signupForm!: NgForm; public colDisplay:any = []; public noData:boolean=true; public first_name: ngOnInit() { this.get_alldata(); } get_alldata(){ } delete_data(){ } insert_data(){ } update_data(){ } onSubmit(){ console.log(this.signupForm.value); } }
